text: Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen lai zunxing an la suo jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing”] ba! Lai zunxing shizhe [mu sheng] de yanxing [“sheng xun”] ba!” Tamen jiu shuo:“Women faxian women de zuxian suo zunxing de yijiao dui women zugoule!” Jishi tamen de zuxian hao wu zhishi qie bu zunxing zhengdao,[nandao tamen ye yao zunxing tamen de zuxian de yijiao ma?]
